overview: From 2025-09-11 to 2025-09-12, elizaos/eliza had 1 new PRs (1 merged), 5 new issues, and 6 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Docs for LLM link is broken
topIssues.author: borisudovicic

topIssues.title: send list of partners to BD (plugins)
topIssues.author: linear

topIssues.title: SDK-first Hooks Mode
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
* Support instantiating Eliza directly in browser via hooks (SDK-first, no REST).
* Provide separate server hooks (useElizaServerChat) for REST/SSE integration.

topIssues.title: Rooms/Channels/Servers/Worlds Refactor
topIssues.author: borisudovicic
topIssues.body:
* Consolidate duplicated DB entities (rooms, worlds, channels, servers) into 2 abstractions (decision pending).
* Update schema, migrations, server logic, and GUI accordingly.
* Prototype refactor before bus rewrite to simplify bus logic.

topPRs.title: fix(core): make SECRET_SALT reads cache-aware and fix plugin-bootstrap test flakiness
topPRs.author: wtfsayo
topPRs.body:
## Summary

This PR fixes core test failures by making SECRET_SALT reads cache-aware to properly reflect environment changes during tests. It also addresses plugin-bootstrap test flakiness.

## Changes Made

### Core Changes
- **packages/core/src/settings.ts**: Updated getSalt() function to always read current environment first and only use cache if it matches the current env value. This ensures tests that change SECRET_SALT environment variables work correctly.

### Test Fixes  
- **packages/plugin-bootstrap/src/__tests__/actions.test.ts**: Fixed generateImageAction test to expect the additional files parameter in the callback
- **packages/plugin-bootstrap/src/__tests__/embedding-queue-management.test.ts**: Added missing log method to runtime mock for EmbeddingGenerationService tests
- **packages/plugin-bootstrap/src/__tests__/test-utils.ts**: Added log method to createMockRuntime for consistency

## Impact
- Resolves CI failures in core/package tests
- Aligns local and CI test behavior
- Eliminates test flakiness in plugin-bootstrap

## Files Changed
- packages/core/src/settings.ts (25 lines: 13 additions, 12 deletions)
- packages/plugin-bootstrap/src/__tests__/actions.test.ts (3 lines: 2 additions, 1 deletion)  
- packages/plugin-bootstrap/src/__tests__/embedding-queue-management.test.ts (2 additions)
- packages/plugin-bootstrap/src/__tests__/test-utils.ts (1 addition)

## Testing
- All core tests now pass consistently
- Plugin-bootstrap tests are no longer flaky
- CI pipeline should pass without issues
